Name: }bedrock.server.dir.backup
PrologProcedure:
#****Begin: Generated Statements***
#****End: Generated Statements****

#Region @DOC
# Description:
# This process has been depreciated and only exists to maintain backwards compatibility. 
#
#EndRegion @DOC

LogOutput( 'WARNING', 'Process "' | GetProcessName() | '" has been depreciated and should no longer be called.' );

Parameters.Name: pExcludeFilter
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimited list of exclusion filters (Default = '.log & .cfg & .csv & .cmal & .txt & .feeders')

Parameters.Name: pRobocopy
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Use Robocopy (WIN Only. Boolean. Default = 0)

Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean. Default = 0)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean. Default = 0)

Parameters.Name: pJson
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: JSON Object with process parameter values. This will overwrite user passed parameters.
